ygData.subject: Re: All Chars
ygData.msgSnippet: He thought to himself. Old friend. After what Galvatron had made him become he didnt think he deserved friends even old ones. But they had a lot to discuss.

Galvatron had made him become he didnt think he
deserved friends even old ones. But they had a lot to
discuss.
